Uses of Class
mklab.JGNN.nn.Initializer

Packages that use Initializer
Package
Description
mklab.JGNN.nn
Implements neural networks components that are combined to define GNNs or other types of machine learning models.
mklab.JGNN.nn.initializers
Implements initializers to be applied on Model parameters to stochastically induce some desired property at the first training epoch.

  • Uses of Initializer in mklab.JGNN.nn

    Methods in mklab.JGNN.nn with parameters of type Initializer
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Model
    Model.init(Initializer initializer)
    Apply the provided initializer on the model to set first values to its parameters.

  • Uses of Initializer in mklab.JGNN.nn.initializers

    Subclasses of Initializer in mklab.JGNN.nn.initializers
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KaimingNormal
    This is a VariancePreservingInitializer.
    class 
    KaimingUniform
    This is a VariancePreservingInitializer.
    class 
    VariancePreservingInitializer
    This class describes a broad class of Initializer strategies, in which dense neural layer initialization is controlled so that variance is mostly preserved from inputs to outputs to avoid vanishing or exploding gradients in the first training runs.
    class 
    XavierNormal
    This is a VariancePreservingInitializer.
    class 
    XavierUniform
    This is a VariancePreservingInitializer.
